title: Void Bringer Illaoi visual bug

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: One of her tentacles coming out from the head is shaped like "zZzZz"

replies.body: I have the EXACT SAME BUG! Riot, please fix this!
Heyo! Would you be able to provide me with your graphics settings?
Stared so long at that image to realize the part you are talking about is cropped in this view. Make sure to click it to reveal it people.
